item.title: Adding 317 starter to inventory?
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

thanks man, youve been helping me alot and i greatly appreciate it, and so does my co owner, he helping me code.

No problem at all Don’t hesistate to ask, I’ll try my best to help you haha.
If you PM me your server I’d like to have a look if you don’t mind

~Leo.

item.title: Adding 317 starter to inventory?
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

[quote=“Da Vinci, post:5, topic:352966”][quote author=Ahyo link=topic=449281.msg3296209#msg3296209 date=1280959742]
OK welll i tried making a starter command for my server and it would work for the staff, but not for the regular players. So if anywould could tell me how to add the items to the inventory, i would greatly appreciate it.
[/quote]

Ight ahyo, you seem like a nice guy so I’ll help you with this aswell.

Open up your

client.java

and search for

if(starter == 0){

Under that you should add something like this

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addSkillXP(200000000, 18) addItem(995,500000000); }

addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT); - add lines of those to add items
addSkillXP(SKILLXPAMOUNT, SKILLID); - add lines of those to add skill XP so when they log in they have a certain level

I think you can figure it out now!

Hope I helped!
~Leo[/quote]

thanks man, youve been helping me alot and i greatly appreciate it, and so does my co owner, he helping me code.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding 317 starter to inventory?
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

Ahyo:

OK welll i tried making a starter command for my server and it would work for the staff, but not for the regular players. So if anywould could tell me how to add the items to the inventory, i would greatly appreciate it.

Ight ahyo, you seem like a nice guy so I’ll help you with this aswell.

Open up your

client.java

and search for

if(starter == 0){

Under that you should add something like this

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addSkillXP(200000000, 18) addItem(995,500000000); }

addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT); - add lines of those to add items
addSkillXP(SKILLXPAMOUNT, SKILLID); - add lines of those to add skill XP so when they log in they have a certain level

I think you can figure it out now!

Hope I helped!
~Leo

item.title: Adding 317 starter to inventory?
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

OK welll i tried making a starter command for my server and it would work for the staff, but not for the regular players. So if anywould could tell me how to add the items to the inventory, i would greatly appreciate it.

ok well i tried what leo said and when i log in on a account that isnt a staff and i do ::starter, i get nothing. But this is the command i have so far for starter in the inventory, the starter still isnt in the inventory, and still doesnt work when i do ::starter.

if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 250);
addItem(1323, 1);
addItem(1333, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(3105, 1);
addItem(6107, 1);
addItem(6108, 1);
addItem(2902, 1);
addItem(6109, 1);
addItem(6568, 1);
addItem(5698, 1);
addItem(4587, 1);
addItem(3842, 1);
starter = 0;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 0) {
sendMessage(“Stop asking for money!”);

when i log on any character that hasnt been created yet, they start off with a iron scimitar, str ammy, wooden shield. i wanna change this so when they log on they start off with everything listed above on them, and the money and mantas in their inventory, and if u can get it so the d scim is equipted on them, then leave out the rune and iron scimitars. Thanks again

Read full topic
